author: Soo Kim
title: Coronavirus Update, Map As Global Cases Pass 1.3 Million, China Reports Zero Daily Deaths for First Time Since January
description: The number of new deaths and cases have dropped in Italy and Spain, while France saw its highest daily death toll and U.K. Prime Minister Boris Johnson remains in intensive care.
content:
Cases of the novel coronavirus have surpassed 1.3 million and spread to at least 184 countries and regions, according to the latest figures from Johns Hopkins University.
The virus, which was first reported in Wuhan, China, has killed nearly 76,000, while mo… [+11324 chars]
